languages.text: "Привязанность есть слабость. А слабость ведет к преждевременной гибели, неугодной Неумирающему. Смерть должна пожинать души лишь тогда, когда приходит отведенное им время. Иногда встречаются люди, не ткачи, с которыми наши дороги сходятся и расходятся. Но то лишь временный спутник. Как... соратники из твоей свиты. Нити наших судеб переплелись, но однажды каждый пойдет своей стезей вновь".

"Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."
languages.original_text: "Привязанность есть слабость. А слабость ведет к преждевременной гибели, неугодной Неумирающему. Смерть должна пожинать души лишь тогда, когда приходит отведенное им время. Иногда встречаются люди, не ткачи, с которыми наши дороги сходятся и расходятся. Но то лишь временный спутник. Как... соратники из твоей свиты. Нити наших судеб переплелись, но однажды каждый пойдет своей стезей вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Attachment is a weakness. And weakness leads to an early fall, one that does not carry His favour. Death must claim souls only when their time comes. Sometimes weavers cross paths with people outside our circle, and their paths diverge just as quickly. For they are nothing more than travelling companions. It is the same with those in your retinue. Our threads may have intertwined for a time, but each of us will be on our way before long."

"Attachment is a weakness. And weakness leads to an early fall, one that does not carry His favour. Death must claim souls only when their time comes. Sometimes weavers cross paths with people outside our circle, and their paths diverge just as quickly. For they are nothing more than travelling companions. It is the same with those in your retinue. Our threads may have intertwined for a time, but each of us will be on our way before long."

"Attachment is weakness. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that weavers occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but everyone will go their separate ways eventually."

languages.text: «El apego nos hace débiles. Y los débiles encuentran un final prematuro. Morir de ese modo no complace al Inmortal, pues no ha de reclamarse un alma antes de que haya llegado su hora. Es cierto que en ocasiones los tejedores comparten viaje con personas ajenas al culto, pero tales compañías nunca perduran. Puede que recorramos juntos el mismo camino, pero no somos más que compañeros de viaje provisionales. Ocurre lo mismo que con los miembros de su séquito. Los hilos de nuestro destino se entrecruzan momentáneamente, pero al final nuestros caminos se separarán. Es inevitable.».
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."

Los hilos de nuestro destino se entrecruzan momentáneamente, pero al final nuestros caminos se separarán. Es inevitable.».

languages.text: 「執着は私たちを弱くする。弱い者は早々に破滅を迎えるの。でも、そんな死は不死の者を喜ばせることはない。なぜなら魂は、その時が来るまで引き取られるべきではないのだから。たしかに織り手は教団外の者たちと交わることもあるけれど、その道は必ず分かたれる。同じ道をともに歩くことはあっても、私たちはあくまで一時的な旅の仲間にすぎない。それはあなたの従者も同じ。私たちの意図は一時的に絡み合うことがあるかもしれないけれど、必然として、すべては別々の道を歩むことになる」
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: 「執着は私たちを弱くする。弱い者は早々に破滅を迎えるの。でも、そんな死は不死の者を喜ばせることはない。なぜなら魂は、その時が来るまで引き取られるべきではないのだから。たしかに織り手は教団外の者たちと交わることもあるけれど、その道は必ず分かたれる。同じ道をともに歩くことはあっても、私たちはあくまで一時的な旅の仲間にすぎない。それはあなたの従者も同じ。私たちの意図は一時的に絡み合うことがあるかもしれないけれど、必然として、すべては別々の道を歩むことになる」

languages.text: “依恋会让我们变得软弱，而软弱之人会过早丧命。然而，这样的死亡并不能取悦不死之神，因为灵魂只有到了大限之际，才应当回到祂的怀抱。确实，我们织网者有时也会与教派之外的成员产生交集，但这样的交集最终总会出现分歧。尽管我们可能会踏上同一条道路，但那只不过是短暂的陪伴而已。这对你的随行人员来说，也同样如此。我们的丝线可能会在一段时间内彼此交织，但我们最终必将分道扬镳，这是不可避免的结果。”
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: “依恋会让我们变得软弱，而软弱之人会过早丧命。然而，这样的死亡并不能取悦不死之神，因为灵魂只有到了大限之际，才应当回到祂的怀抱。确实，我们织网者有时也会与教派之外的成员产生交集，但这样的交集最终总会出现分歧。尽管我们可能会踏上同一条道路，但那只不过是短暂的陪伴而已。这对你的随行人员来说，也同样如此。我们的丝线可能会在一段时间内彼此交织，但我们最终必将分道扬镳，这是不可避免的结果。”

languages.text: "Bindungen schwächen uns. Die Schwachen begegnen ihrem Untergang vorzeitig. Aber ein derartiger Tod gefällt dem Todlosen nicht, denn eine Seele soll nicht abgeholt werden, bevor ihre Zeit gekommen ist. Es stimmt, dass Spinner manchmal Seelen außerhalb des Kultes begegnen, doch diese Wege trennen sich am Ende immer. Wir beschreiten vielleicht dieselbe Straße, sind aber nicht mehr als vorübergehende Reisegefährten. In Eurem Gefolge ist das ähnlich. Unsere Fäden verweben sich für eine Weile, aber es ist unvermeidlich, dass letztlich alle getrennte Wege gehen."
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."

Es stimmt, dass Spinner manchmal Seelen außerhalb des Kultes begegnen, doch diese Wege trennen sich am Ende immer. Unsere Fäden verweben sich für eine Weile, aber es ist unvermeidlich, dass letztlich alle getrennte Wege gehen."

languages.text: « L'attachement nous rend faibles, et les faibles sont condamnés à mourir prématurément. Mais l'Immortel ne cautionne guère une telle issue, car les âmes ne doivent pas être fauchées avant l'heure. S'il est vrai que les tisseurs croisent parfois des étrangers au culte, tôt ou tard, leurs voies finissent toujours par diverger. Quand bien même nous arpentons la même route, nous ne sommes rien de plus que des compagnons de voyage temporaires. Et il en va de même pour votre entourage. Nos fils peuvent bien s'entremêler quelque temps, mais au bout du compte, nos chemins sont appelés à se séparer. »
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. It is true that spinners occasionally cross paths with those outside the cult, but such paths always diverge in the end. We may walk the same road together, but we are nothing more than temporary travelling companions. It is similar for those of your retinue. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."

languages.text: "Bağlantı kurmak bizi güçsüz kılar. İlk ölenler de güçsüzler olur. Ancak bu ölümler, Ölmeyen'i tatmin etmez zira ruhlar vakitleri gelmeden alınmamalıdır. Zaman zaman başkalarıyla yollarımızın kesiştiği doğrudur ancak o yollar, nihayetinde daima ayrı düşer. Aynı yoldan yürüsek de sadece geçici bir süreliğine yol arkadaşlığı yaparız. Maiyetindekilerle olduğu gibi. Bir süreliğine ipliklerimiz birbirinin içine geçebilir ancak yolların ayrılması kaçınılmazdır."
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak. The weak meet their demise prematurely. But such death does not please the Undying One, for a soul must not be claimed before their time has come. Our threads may intertwine for a time, but all will go their separate ways as is inevitable."
